mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPROVAL ( APPR_ID , DMD_DT , APPR_CTGR , APPR_STS , APPR_TTL , APPR_CNTNT , DMD_ID , APPR_MNG_ID , ARRP_RJCT , LAST_CN_DT , APPR_FNSH_DT , RNTL_STS , DEL_YN) VALUES ( #{apprId} , SYSDATE , #{apprCtgr} , '801' , #{apprTtl} , #{apprCntnt} , #{dmdId} , #{apprMngId} , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL ,'N')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.DMD_ID = E.EMP_ID WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.APPR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.DMD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') DMD_DT , A.APPR_CTGR , A.APPR_STS , A.APPR_TTL , A.APPR_CNTNT , A.DMD_ID , A.APPR_MNG_ID , A.ARRP_RJCT , A.LAST_CN_DT , A.APPR_FNSH_DT , E.EMP_NAME , E.PRFL , CC.CMCD_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.DMD_ID = E.EMP_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON E.PSTN_ID = CC.CMCD_ID INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPT_ID = E.DEPT_ID WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY DMD_DT DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.DMD_ID = E.EMP_ID WHERE A.DMD_ID = #{_parameter} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.APPR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.DMD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') DMD_DT , A.APPR_CTGR , A.APPR_STS , A.APPR_TTL , A.APPR_CNTNT , A.DMD_ID , A.APPR_MNG_ID , A.ARRP_RJCT , A.LAST_CN_DT , A.APPR_FNSH_DT , E.EMP_NAME , CC.CMCD_NAME FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.DMD_ID = E.EMP_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON E.PSTN_ID = CC.CMCD_ID WHERE A.DMD_ID = #{_parameter} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY DMD_DT DESC

SELECT A.APPR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.DMD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') DMD_DT , A.APPR_CTGR , A.APPR_STS , A.APPR_TTL , A.APPR_CNTNT , A.DMD_ID , A.APPR_MNG_ID , A.ARRP_RJCT , A.LAST_CN_DT , A.APPR_FNSH_DT , E.EMP_NAME , CC.CMCD_NAME FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.DMD_ID = E.EMP_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON E.PSTN_ID = CC.CMCD_ID WHERE A.APPR_ID = #{_parameter} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT A.APPR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.DMD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') DMD_DT , A.APPR_CTGR , A.APPR_STS , A.APPR_TTL , A.APPR_CNTNT , A.RNTL_STS , A.ARRP_RJCT , E.EMP_NAME , E_MNG.EMP_NAME MNG_EMP_NAME , CC.CMCD_NAME , PM.PRDT_MNG_ID , PM.BRRW_YN , P.PRDT_NAME , P.PRDT_CTGR , AD.CUR_STR APPR_DTL_CUR_STR , P.CUR_STR P_CUR_STR FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON E.EMP_ID = A.DMD_ID INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E_MNG ON E_MNG.EMP_ID = A.APPR_MNG_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON CC.CMCD_ID = E.PSTN_ID INNER JOIN APPROVAL_DETAIL AD ON A.APPR_ID = AD.APPR_ID INNER JOIN PRODUCT_MANAGEMENT PM ON PM.PRDT_MNG_ID = AD.PRDT_ID INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRDT_ID = PM.PRDT_ID WHERE A.APPR_ID = #{_parameter} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.DMD_ID = E.EMP_ID WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.APPR_STS = '801'
AND A.APPR_STS != '801'
AND A.APPR_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.DMD_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.DMD_DT <= SYSDATE - 7
AND A.DMD_DT >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)
AND A.DMD_DT = #{searchDate}
AND A.DMD_ID = #{employeeVO.empId}

SELECT A.APPR_ID , TO_CHAR(A.DMD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') DMD_DT , A.APPR_CTGR , A.APPR_STS , A.APPR_TTL , A.APPR_CNTNT , A.DMD_ID , A.APPR_MNG_ID , A.ARRP_RJCT , A.LAST_CN_DT , A.APPR_FNSH_DT , A.RNTL_STS , E.EMP_NAME , E.PRFL , CC.CMCD_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME FROM APPROVAL A INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON A.DMD_ID = E.EMP_ID INNER JOIN COMMON_CODE CC ON E.PSTN_ID = CC.CMCD_ID INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPT_ID = E.DEPT_ID WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N'
AND A.APPR_STS = '801'
AND A.APPR_STS != '801'
AND A.APPR_TTL LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.DMD_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND A.DMD_DT <= SYSDATE - 7
AND A.DMD_DT >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1)
AND A.DMD_DT = #{searchDate}
AND A.DMD_ID = #{employeeVO.empId}
ORDER BY DMD_DT DESC
